comments.body: I don't usually like to see authors removed except by themselves. Does @Bolisov no longer want to see updates?

They were pinged much earlier on by TS bot here: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/40407#issuecomment-554205819

They were the original authors of the type generator which we've forked since they've gone unresponsive. Their profile also indicates that they haven't had any Github activity [since 2018](https://github.com/Bolisov) ¯\\\_(ツ)_/¯
